name: Dune 2: The Building of A Dynasty
description:
This script will facilitate you install of this game on Linux OS:
"Dune II" DOS CD edition using dunelegacy project:
http://dunelegacy.sourceforge.net/
During install please let all options by default.
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions on Linux platform.
notes:
- dunelegacy x64 Git version 0.96.4 - 24 september 2020
- You will need the CD only one time during install.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/
content:
custom-name: Dune II - CD DOS - dunelegacy
files:
- dlegacy: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Dune%20II/dunelegacy_x64.7z
game:
  exe: dunelegacy
installer:
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc Dune II
    requires: virgin/dune2/dune2.exe
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/data
    src: $DISC/virgin/dune2/
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: dlegacy
